import { useState} from 'react' import MovieCard from './MovieCard' function GenreList() { const [findmovies, setMoviesBy] = useState([]) function FindMovie(selectedGenre, selectedYear) { fetch('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=9122d3e99f5cf10f65b111a1dcd51b20&with_genres=' + selectedGenre + '&primary_release_year=' + selectedYear +'&language=ru-RU&page=1') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setMoviesBy(data.results) }) } return ( <>

Search By Genre

{ findmovies.map(item => ( )) }
) } export default GenreList;
